text: The following lists events that happened in 1918 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *Monarch - Kristján X *Prime Minister - Jón Magnússon ==Events== *19 October - Icelandic sovereignty referendum, 1918 *1 December - Danish–Icelandic Act of Union *1918 Úrvalsdeild ==Births== *26 September - Ólafur Jóhann Sigurðsson, novelist, short story writer and poet (d. 1988) *18 November - Óli B. Jónsson, football player and manager (d. 2005) ==Deaths== Torfhildur Þorsteinsdóttir *14 November - Torfhildur Þorsteinsdóttir, writer (b. 1845). ==References== Category:1910s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1918 in Iceland
